content.raw:
Seems like `void Scene::RemoveVisualizations(rendering::VisualPtr _vis)` is supposed to remove the visual objects with a name starting with “box::” but it does not?

This function removes a visual object with its child visual objects which has either VT\_PHYSICS, VT\_SENSOR, or VT\_GUI as visual type. The error messages are about visual objects with sufix \(like “box::link”\), which are supposed to be childs of “box”. Do they have different visual types so they are not removed?
content.html:
Seems like void Scene::RemoveVisualizations(rendering::VisualPtr _vis) is supposed to remove the visual objects with a name starting with “box::” but it does not?

This function removes a visual object with its child visual objects which has either VT_PHYSICS, VT_SENSOR, or VT_GUI as visual type. The error messages are about visual objects with sufix (like “box::link”), which are supposed to be childs of “box”. Do they have different visual types so they are not removed?
